General.Name: BBS-Bioactive Bone Substitutes Oyj
General.Description: BBS-Bioactive Bone Substitutes Oyj, a biomedical technology company, develops, manufactures, and commercializes bioactive medical devices and implants for orthopedic surgery in Finland. It offers ARTEBONE, an orthobiological product based on tricalcium phosphate and natural spectrum of bone proteins used primarily for the treatment of bone defects and healing problems in extremities, such as foot and ankle. The company was incorporated in 1991 and is headquartered in Oulu, Finland.

2.Name: Mr. Paul C. Watkins
2.Title: Chief Commercial Officer & Member of Advisory Board
